title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, Juvenile Delinquency Forms (Family Court Act Article 3), form 3-3 - Appearance ticket
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, Juvenile Delinquency Forms (Family Court Act Article 3), form 3-3 - Appearance ticket

State Regulations

Sec. 307.1 F.C.A. Form 3-3
(Juvenile Delinquency)
7/83
APPEARANCE TICKET
(Pursuant to Family Court Act ยง307.1
)

Date: ________
To: ____________
(Child)
____________
(Parent)
(Person legally responsible for Child's
care)
____________
(Address)
____________
(Address)
YOU AND EACH OF YOU ARE HEREBY DIRECTED TO
APPEAR on the ________ day of ________, 19 ________, at ________ (A.M.) (P.M.)
at the probation service of ________ County, at (Street and City Address)
________, New York, in connection with the following crime(s) allegedly
committed by the child, who is ________ years of age: [Include time and place.]
____________
____________
Name of Issuer: ______________
(Print)

Signature of Issuer: ________
(Police Officer) (Peace Officer)
(Probation Service Director)
(Designee)
(Administrator of Detention Facility)
(Designee)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, Juvenile Delinquency

Forms (Family Court Act Article 3), form
3-3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
